services.title: Data Engineering and Analytics
services.description: We design and build modern data architectures that enable companies to centralize information from multiple sources, automate ETL/ELT processes, and ensure data quality and reliability for analysis and reporting.

consultorias-datos.descripcion: Discover the unlimited potential of your data with SGS Analytics, your comprehensive partner in Data Consulting and Analytics as a Service. From effective data management to transforming big data into strategic decisions, we offer customized solutions that drive innovation and business performance. With us, your journey to data excellence begins now.

desarrollos-etl.descripcion: Optimize your data management with our ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) Development services at SGS Analytics. We simplify data flow, from extraction to loading, ensuring seamless integration and timely availability of key information. Our customized approach guarantees an efficient ETL architecture, driving quality and agility in decision-making. Trust us to convert your data into strategic assets with our leading ETL development service.

business-intelligence.descripcion: Business Intelligence for companies provides significant value, enabling businesses to gain competitive advantages. Through business intelligence solutions, companies can significantly improve their decision-making, increase operational efficiency, and achieve sustainable competitive advantages.

automatizacion-procesos.descripcion: Transform your operations with the efficiency of process automation from SGS Analytics. We simplify and optimize your workflows, eliminating manual tasks and freeing up valuable time. From opportunity identification to implementation of robust solutions, we offer automation services that drive productivity and business agility. Give your team the freedom to focus on what matters while we do the heavy lifting!

transformacion-digital.descripcion: We accelerate the digital transformation of companies through cloud architectures, DevOps, and automation on AWS, Azure, and GCP. We are experts in security, operational efficiency, and cost optimization in cloud environments, ensuring scalability and sustainable results.

data-governance-services.descripcion: We guarantee excellence in data management to enhance your analytical strategy. From policy creation and security to role definition, we optimize the quality and reliability of your data. With SGS Analytics, we transform information into intelligence to drive your success.

powerBi.title: Executive Dashboards and Analytics with Power BI
powerBi.description: At SGS Analytics, we develop executive dashboards in Power BI that enable finance, sales, and operations departments to replace manual Excel reports with automated, real-time analytics.

dataScience.title: Applied Data Science and Artificial Intelligence
dataScience.description: We implement predictive models and artificial intelligence for business use cases, integrating <mlops>MLOps</mlops> practices for their operation in production environments.
dataScience.descriptionFormatted: We implement predictive models and artificial intelligence for business use cases, integrating {mlops} practices for their operation in production environments.

dataGovernance.title: Data Governance and Quality
dataGovernance.description: We help organizations establish data governance models based on the <dama>DAMA</dama> framework, ensuring the appropriate use of information for decision-making.

finOps.title: Cloud Cost Optimization
finOps.description: Through <finops>FinOps</finops> practices and our cloud expertise, we help companies optimize their costs through visibility, control, and prediction of cloud spending.

1.title: Effective Data Strategies
1.content: An organizational change in how decisions are made and strategies are created. We have experience in making corporate strategies happen using data.

2.title: Statistical Analysis
2.content: Describe the nature of the data to be analyzed. Explore the relationship of the data with the underlying population. Create a model that summarizes the understanding of the relationship of the data with the underlying population. Demonstrate (or refute) the validity of the model.

3.title: ETL Development
3.content: ETL is a type of data integration that refers to the three steps (extract, transform, load) used to blend data from multiple sources. It is often used to build a data warehouse.

4.title: Database
4.content: A database stores data and connects it into a logical unit along with the metadata necessary for its processing. Databases are highly useful tools for managing large files and facilitating information queries.

5.title: Data Governance
5.content: Data governance is a term used at both macro and micro levels. The first is a political concept and is part of international relations and Internet governance; the latter is a data management concept and is part of corporate data governance.

6.title: Digital Transformation
6.content: Digital transformation is the process by which an organization integrates digital technology into all business areas. This process completely changes the way an organization delivers value to customers.

7.title: KPI Development
7.content: A KPI is a quantifiable value used in the organization to track and determine the progress of a specific business objective. KPIs allow organizations to evaluate their performance and decide whether to continue with current behaviors or if they need to change strategy.

8.title: Automation
8.content: Automation involves using technology to perform tasks with very little human intervention. It can be implemented in any sector where repetitive tasks are performed.

9.title: RPA and Virtual Agents
9.content: We automate processes with intelligent bots and virtual assistants that reduce repetitive tasks and improve operational efficiency through AI and RPA.

10.title: Cloud Optimization (Azure, GCP, AWS)
10.content: We optimize your cloud environments (Azure, GCP, AWS) to improve performance, security, and reduce costs, applying architecture and FinOps strategies.

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.description: Problem, technical approach, and results in real projects. Duration and team size included.

retail-analytics.title: Retail: real-time visibility
retail-analytics.problem: Retail chain with no unified visibility of sales or inventory in real time. Manual, out-of-sync reporting between stores and HQ.
retail-analytics.approach: Cloud data pipeline (AWS), real-time dashboards with Power BI, and demand forecasting with ML models.
retail-analytics.result: ~40% reduction in report generation time; significant improvement in in-store product availability.

fintech-data-platform.title: Fintech: single source of truth
fintech-data-platform.problem: Multiple ununified data sources, manual and slow reporting. Business and risk teams with misaligned metrics.
fintech-data-platform.approach: Data lake on AWS, ETL with dbt, dimensional modeling, and Power BI as visualization and embedded reporting layer.
fintech-data-platform.result: Single source of truth; reports that used to take days available in minutes. ~30% less time on operational analysis.

telecom-cost-optimization.title: Telecom: cloud cost control
telecom-cost-optimization.problem: Cloud infrastructure costs with no central control and fragmented billing across teams and projects.
telecom-cost-optimization.approach: Governance with tagging, FinOps practices, cost dashboards by account and service, and resource optimization (rightsizing).
telecom-cost-optimization.result: Estimated 20-25% savings on cloud costs; full visibility by area and project.
